content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  February 13 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned 'BBB+' ratings to the  EUR and GBP denominated senior unsecured notes issued by McKesson Corp. (NYSE:  MCK). A full list of ratings follows at the end of the release.  KEY RATING DRIVERS Stable Operations  Low Margins The credit profiles of MCK and its peers benefit from stable operating profiles  and consistent cash generation.
